solver.explanations

Class LazyExplanationEngineFromRestart

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.explanations.ExplanationEngine
      • solver.explanations.RecorderExplanationEngine
        • solver.explanations.LazyExplanationEngineFromRestart
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, IMonitorInitPropagation, ISearchMonitor

    public class LazyExplanationEngineFromRestart
extends RecorderExplanationEngine
    A explanation engine that works in a lazy way. It stores events on the fly, but do not compute anything until an explicit call is made. However, it needs to be used AFTER RESTART only. Otherwise, it can be not synchronized anymore.
    Since:
    25/03/13
    Author:
    Charles Prud'homme
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
